description: ICS techniques mitigated by Application Developer Guidance, ATT&CK mitigation M0913 (v1.0)
name: Application Developer Guidance (M0913)

techniques.comment: Ensure that applications and devices do not store sensitive data or credentials insecurely (e.g., plaintext credentials in code, published credentials in repositories, or credentials in public cloud storage). (Citation: CISA June 2013)
